alert.note: Alert for Bear River Range (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Avalanche Warning issued December 28 at 6:15AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...The Forest Service Utah Avalanche Center in Salt Lake City has ISSUED an AVALANCHE WARNING which is in effect until 6 AM MST Thursday... * WHAT...Heavy snow and drifting overloaded slopes with widespread buried persistent weak layers and created very dangerous avalanche conditions in the backcountry. HIGH avalanche danger exists at all elevations, with both dangerous human triggered and large and long running natural avalanches likely. * WHERE...Bear River Range of Northern Utah and Southeast Idaho. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Heavy snow and drifting have created widespread areas of unstable snow. Both human triggered and natural avalanches are likely. Stay off of and out from under slopes steeper than 30 degrees. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Consult www.utahavalanchecenter.org or www.avalanche.org for more detailed information. Similar avalanche danger may exist at locations outside the coverage area of this or any avalanche center.
